title: Mini-Ep 49: Boundary It Up
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 49: Boundary It Up
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree get a voicemail from a listener across the pond who shares Paris reccs and a game-changing skincare tip, receive some very helpful laundry lessons, and lend advice to a new mother who’s dealing with anxiety, depression, and overbearing f...
description:
Kate and Doree get a voicemail from a listener across the pond who shares Paris reccs and a game-changing skincare tip, receive some very helpful laundry lessons, and lend advice to a new mother who’s dealing with anxiety, depression, and overbearing family members.

We’re going to SXSW this year! Find more info about our appearances here. RSVP for our March 10 Meet Up in Austin with Natch Beaut here.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Buffy - Try a Buffy in your home for 30 days! To receive $20 off a comforter, visit buffy.co and use promo code forever35.
  • Fabletics - Become a VIP member with Fabletics and get 2 leggings for only $24, just visit fabletics.com/forever35.
  • Away - Get $20 off an Away suitcase! Visit awaytravel.com/serums and use promo code serums.


Theme music by Riot


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
